problem.markdown:
>>Which facility has the highest number of HIV tests performed?<< [[(Crocodile Hospital Gateway PHC), Sushi Hospital Gateway PHC, Red Deer Health Centre, Spaghetti Health Centre]]
[explanation] Crocodile Hospital Gateway PHC performed the highest number of HIV tests [explanation]
problem.p: Which facility has the highest number of HIV tests performed?

optioninput.label: Which facility has the highest number of HIV tests performed?
optioninput.options: ('Crocodile Hospital Gateway PHC','Sushi Hospital Gateway PHC','Red Deer Health Centre','Spaghetti Health Centre')

div.p: Crocodile Hospital Gateway PHC performed the highest number of HIV tests
